tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Dr. Manish Agarwal for a wisdom tooth extraction. I was terrified of the procedure however, was inspired by his calm and confident demeanor when he said it’s simple and all will be well. It took me a good 20 minutes to convince myself that I had to get it done and the rest is history! 
The timing of the entire procedure mentioned to me was on point but more than anything, I really appreciated the way Dr. Manish handled me in that stressful situation. Even after the procedure, he kept answering all my questions right down to the silliest ones, even on his birthday, what a blessing he is!!
I will definitely recommend Dr. Manish to everyone not only for his expertise in the dental space but also because he really lives up to his mantra of “Spreading Smiles".

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gap Closing,Dental Crowns,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Wedding Smile Planner,Smile Designing,
review:
Manish Sir, has been recommended by one of my cousin and he has been very friendly from Day 1.
Explains the whole process in Lay man terms and also provides exact vision of results.
My treatment is still under process (For Smile Designs) but this feedback is based on my last 4 sittings.

He has very soft hands with which, he keeps patients comfort at first priority.
Does what is really required and what will be best for you rather then just complete a procedure to make some monetary gains.

Until now I have undergone, Gum Trimming, Tooth Extraction, RCT, Dental filling and experience has been super satisfactory and comfortable.
That is a very Single reason i travel all the way from Pune to get my treatment completed in Mumbai.

Anyone can consult him without any second thought, you would really be satisfied.

Looking forward to complete my treatment plan for smile design.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He was good the treatment was not painful and everything was up to mark , Dr Meghana was excellent to approach anytime needed and gave confidence 
Over all the treatment room is very clean hygiene well protected for COVID too
All the experience with the staff also good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Manish is one of those rare breed of Dentists who remain absolutely cool under all circumstances.
All factors are explained, procedures are explained in details so that the patient knows exactly what is going on inside his/her mouth with Doctor in attendance 
It is a treat to be treated by Dr Manish
May God Bless him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr manish and kavita are very friendly and caring doctors. always the right advise if not required they wont do any treatment. 
very friendly and compassionate with elderly patients too. you have a dentist for life if youve been dealing with them.  highly recommend them.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
We have got done the Full mouth rehabilitation and cosmetic/ esthetic treatment from Dr. Manish Agrawal. The treatment was complicated and many doctors shown their unability for this treatment however doctor Agrawal not only gave us confidence before the treatment but delivered the great results. It's been almost 3 years for the treatment and there is absolutely no issues with the dentures.
I strongly recommend him. My best wishes to Dr. Manish.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Manish Agarwal and his wife are dentists, doctors but for all of us in family they both are a family. For Dr Manish, the dental care of patient comes first and he took care of my husband without asking when we would pay him.  And actually never asked for his fees until we paid him after almost more than year. May God bless him and world have many more dedicated commited Doctors like him. A true doctor by ethics.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: My rapport with dr manish was very good.He was very patient while the entire treatment was happening.I always got immediate appointment from his side whenever there was an issue.Never had to wait...would highly recommend dr manish agrawal for any kind of dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr.Manish Agarwal and Dr. Kavita Agarwal are highly professional and very polite. I am usually very scared of dental procedures, but, Dr.Manish Agarwal really eased me out before my tooth extraction. Even the post procedure instructions are given properly. Will highly recommend him.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: My smile designing  by Dr Manish Agrawal gave me confidence to smile and changed my life. Very happy with my treatment and friendly nature of the doctor.Clinic is wonderful well equipped with latest machines. Will be very happy to recommend to all my friends and family members. Thank you

review: A talented doctor **** ***** **********He was gentle and very good at his work.recommended for treatment.

review: A friend in a doctor or a doctor in a friend! Ticks on all fronts that one can expect from a doctor. Great experience and swift procedure and effortless recovery!

review: Would definitely recommend this doctor. He is very good. Not much wait time is required. He is very gentle.

review: Dr.Maneesh is extremely talented and does his job with perfection. Me and my family visit this clinic since a decade now. We trust their advice and treatment completely. I fully recommend this clinic

review: Doctor is very friendly n patiently listens to our problems.  Does not hurry inspite of a number of patients waiting for him. We get value for the money spent

review: The experience with the Doctor was very satisfactory, ***** ********* *** ***** ** *** The results were amazing and I strongly recommend his treatment for any dental treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Done the dental bridge of 3 teeth long back…… may be due to some teeth issue or eating very hard stuff, bridge supported tooth cracked and bridge dropped…. Retreated and refixed….. Dr competent and confident….. excellent doctors in the clinic for all types of dental related issues……
